participant_1.background:
I am resilient and intelligent, thanks to my mom and my love for reading.
I saw a blue whale when I went to the aquarium.
I've got a pretty big collection of old music records that I like to show my kids.
i have a masters degree.
I enjoy relaxing in the low tide and thinking about my family.

participant_2.background:
I remember playing with my raincoat-wearing toys in the rain.
i play games at the arcade , still.
my husband was a salesman.
I am passionate about civic engagement and making my voice heard.
i am eighteen years old.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How about yourself?
I'm doing well too, thank you. What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy playing games at the arcade, listening to music, and spending time with my family.
That sounds fun! I love music too, and I also enjoy playing games. What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play all sorts of games, but my favorite are racing games and fighting games.
Those sound like fun games! I've never been very good at racing games, but I love playing fighting games.
It's okay, I'm not very good at racing games either. But I'm really good at fighting games!
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be good at fighting games, but I can never seem to get the hang of them.
It just takes practice! I've been playing fighting games for years, so I'm pretty good at them now.
Well, I'm glad you enjoy them. I might have to try playing them more often.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
